name: The Delivery (Card00r)
description:
Ruined by the years of pollution and greed, Earth is now a barren wasteland. However, there exists the smallest chance for its survival and recovery. Your Space Vessel's cargo holds plant seeds of every kind and it is up to you and companion to ensure their Delivery. Work together to evade debris and fight your way through hostile ships to reach the Tube.

Assets made before the Game Jam: N/A
